title: Workshop on Developing Collaborative Learning Strategies in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening capacity to design and implement elementary social studies collaborative projects in a blended learning environment using personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can design three classroom structures that promote collaborative learning in a blended learning environment.
Learners apply at least two communication strategies to enhance social presence in digital tool-based collaborative projects.
Learners develop and implement a rubric for evaluating elementary social studies-linked collaborative projects.
Learners identify three or more emotional support needs arising in a blended learning environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
